description.displayText: Isabelle has been our summer babysitter for the last three years. Our kids absolutely love her. In fact they ask us to go out so that Isabelle can come babysit. She is kind, sweet and conscientious.  Isabelle also taught tennis this past summer at our club, and the kids adored her. Often times I would see her on the court looking like the Pied Piper with so many doe eyed kids flocking to her side. I would recommend Isabelle to any family and they should be so lucky to find her.
